Articles.Content:
Kerbal Vexillology Gallery

Welcome to the Kerbal Vexillology Gallery. This is where you can download many new flags to add to your game. New flags are unveiled here all the time, so remember to keep checking back for more. I do take requests from the comments sometimes. 

How to download:

**Steam Users: Drop downloaded images into**

Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Squad\Flags

**Windows/Mac/Linux Users: Drop downloaded images into**

ksp\_win\GameData\Squad\Flags

1. ISRO Flag

![I7ooE6v.png](http://i.imgur.com/I7ooE6v.png)

2. JAXA Flag

![kETwyQK.png](http://i.imgur.com/kETwyQK.png)

3. Space Shuttle Program Flag

![IUCxjn9.png](http://i.imgur.com/IUCxjn9.png)

4. SpaceX Flag

![N0By6Wd.png](http://i.imgur.com/N0By6Wd.png)

5. United Kingdom Space Agency Flag

![HrYfb9U.png](http://i.imgur.com/HrYfb9U.png)

6. United Federation of Planets (Star Trek) Flag

![EVHwsoW.png](http://i.imgur.com/EVHwsoW.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-11T16:53:49Z" title="06/11/2015 04:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 11, 2015</time> by MikeFox1**
I suggest adding the word "flags" to the title. That's what I'd be searching for, anyway. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Is the download necessary for the images?

You know we can just simply right click and save them to our computers.
The download is another way to get these flags, along with clicking and saving the pictures.
Google Drive for download only works if you give permission for people to get the file.
